title: effect to Regulation (EU) No 604/20131 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Dublin
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Dublin 

System) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 21 July 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (dublin system) (amendment) regulation 2025 (2) regulation shall come operation 21 july 2025

title: effect to Regulation (EU) No 604/20131 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 2. Regulation 10 of the European Union (Dublin System) Regulations 2018
text_raw:
2. Regulation 10 of the European Union (Dublin System) Regulations 2018 

(S.I. No. 62 of 2018) is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (4), by 
subparagraph for subparagraph (b): 

the substitution of 

the following 

“(b) 
for such period as is necessary to facilitate the transfer of 
the person which period shall be as short as possible and shall not 
exceed 42 days from the time of his or her arrest.”, 

and 

(b) 

in paragraph (10), by 
subparagraph for subparagraph (a): 

the substitution of 

the following 

“(a) 
in a place listed in Schedule 4, for such period as is 
necessary to facilitate the transfer of the person which period shall 
be as short as possible and shall not exceed 42 days from the time 
of his or her arrest,”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 July, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN T.D., 

Minister for Justice, Home Affairs and Migration. 

1 OJ No. L 180, 29.06.2013, p.31. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 18th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [317] 3
